unnormalised: Athlete biographies offer rich insights! Dr. Sharma's biography on Dhyan Chand is inspiring. Learning about PT Usha's struggles in Payyoli is moving. More detail on Indian sports infrastructure (e.g., the 5000 sq ft NIS Patiala) would be valuable. Rs. 50 lakh rewards and date of the award should be mentioned clearly. Also, the distance run by Milkha Singh in km in Rome.
